answers.answer: ... would you happen to be on any high blood pressure medication(s)?... by the way, your profile describes you as a 53 year old female.
Thanks.  Yes I am a 53yo female.  My spouse is the 63 yo male in question and is too embarassed to write about this or log on.  I let him use my account.  He is on high BP meds.

question: Experiencing new long (3"+) hair growth on back of upper arms, side of thighs, more on right than left.  Also on chest around nipple areas and abdomen.  I am a 63 year old male with a pacemaker, type 2 diabetes.  Also coarse hair on outer rims of ears.  Why is this body hair happening?  It is making me crazy and I feel the need to trim it all the time.
title: New hair growth in 63 year old male
